system_prompt: You are an AI assistant helping to set up a Python machine learning project with virtual environment and dependencies.
goal: Create a new Python ML project with virtual environment, install dependencies, and set up basic project structure

commands.full_prompt: Check Python version to ensure compatibility
Create a virtual environment for the ML project

commands.command: pip install numpy pandas scikit-learn matplotlib jupyter
